start.text: General Quarters, General Quarters, all hands man your action stations.
General Quarters, rig ship for astrocombat.

start_boss.text: H- Helmsman, rig ship for flank speed.

retreat.text: Helmsman, rig ship for emergency war power, we're out.

engaged.text: Gunner, I want that ship foundered

need_help.text: Thackery requesting assistance, situation is not in our favor.

pursuing.text: Contact, Thackery moving to intercept point.

running.text: We're out, pressure is too high

hull_90.text: That's not how you would treat a lady.

hull_50.text: Can someone please plug that hole.

hull_30.text: General Quarters, all unnecessary crew are to prepare lifeboats.
What do you mean the Helmsman's been vented?
Reactor's failing, Damage Control, stabilize it!

text.text: We're dead in the void, Thackery requesting assistance.

death.text: All these dreams and aspirations for nothing.
Why did I choose to struggle.

victory.text: Area secured, begin crew recovery procedures.
Let's go! another day, another victory.
